title: Remove Mordekaiser's W XP passive
body:
And put it on a "Melee only" item.

Why you may ask?
Well, Mordekaiser was supposed to spearhead non-marksmen bot lane picks but the amount of gimmicks added to his kit in order to make it work was somewhat of a bandaid fix.

Instead of just tailoring one champion to be able to go toe to toe with marksmen Riot should've introduced systemic changes that allow other champions to go bot lane without being cucked by the standard Marksman+Support combo.

Giving them a way to not fall behind in levels and allow them to reach their powerspikes earlier would really open up bot lane for other melee carries.
